data.name: Amazon Prototype
data.description: Working Prototype of real Amazon application
data.dialogData:
Technology Stack:
  • Front-end: React.js, Redux
  • Back-end: Node.js, Express.js, Kafka MQ
  • Database: MongoDB, MySQL, Redis
  • Deployment: Amazon EC2
  • Testing: JUnit, Mocha
Personas
  • Customer
    • Create new profile
    • Save Cards and Address
    • Add to cart
    • Order and CheckOut
  • Seller
    • Manage Inventory and Prices
    • View Statistics
    • Accept Order
    • Update Tracking Status
  • Admin
    • Add/Remove Categories
    • View Analytics Dashboard

data.name: Handshake Prototype
data.description: Working Prototype of real Handshake application
data.dialogData:
Click here for Youtube link
Developed the code in 3 phases
Phase 1 Technology Stack:
  • Front-end: React.js
  • Back-end: Node.js, Express.js
  • Database: MySQL
  • Deployment: Docker, Amazon EC2
  • Testing: JUnit, Mocha
Phase 2 Technology Stack:
  • Front-end: React.js, Redux, Thunk
  • Back-end: Node.js, Express.js, Kafka MQ, JWT, Passport
  • Database: MongoDB
  • Deployment: Amazon EC2
  • Testing: JUnit, Mocha
Phase 3 Technology Stack:
  • Front-end: React.js, GraphQL
  • Back-end: Node.js, Express.js
  • Database: MongoDB
  • Deployment: Amazon EC2
  • Testing: JUnit, Mocha
Personas
  • Student
    • Create/Update profile
    • Apply for jobs/events
    • Upload resume
    • Message other student/company
    • View other students/company
  • Company
    • Create/Update profile
    • Add new jobs/events
    • Message students
    • View student's profile/resume
    • Update application status

data.name: Healing Hearts
data.description: A common portal for donating and raising donations for NGOs
data.dialogData:
Technology Stack:
  • Front-end: React.js, Redux, Localization, Pagination
  • Back-end: Node.js, Express.js
  • Database: MongoDB
  • Deployment: Amazon EC2
  • Testing: JUnit, Mocha
Personas
  • Donor
    • Create new profile
    • View fundraisers
    • Fund fundraisers
    • View analytics
    • Message NGOs
  • NGO
    • Create Fundraisers
    • Message donors
    • View analytics
